# supportsDisbursements(using:)

**Type Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether this device can process disbursement requests using the specified payment network brands.

## Declaration

```swift
class func supportsDisbursements(using supportedNetworks: [PKPaymentNetwork]) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **supportedNetworks**: An array of `PKPaymentNetwork` elements to check.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the device supports processing disbursements through any of the specified networks; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Determining whether the user can make payments or disbursements

- **canMakePayments()**: Returns whether the user can make payments.
- **canMakePayments(usingNetworks:)**: Returns whether the user can make payments through the specified network.
- **canMakePayments(usingNetworks:capabilities:)**: Returns whether the user can make payments using a card from the specified network with the specified capabilities.
- **supportsDisbursements()**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether this device can process disbursement requests.
- **supportsDisbursements(using:capabilities:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this device can process disbursement requests using the specified payment network brands and capabilities.
